alert.note: Alert for Gregory (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 29 at 11:01PM MDT until May 30 at 7:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...THE SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING FOR GREGORY COUNTY HAS EXPIRED... The storms which prompted the warning have weakened below severe limits, and no longer pose an immediate threat to life or property. Therefore, the warning has been allowed to expire. However gusty winds are still possible with these thunderstorms. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for south central South Dakota. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Sioux Falls. Remember, a Severe Thunderstorm Warning still remains in effect for portions of eastern Gregory County.
